Status SetStatus (Status status) const

Detailed Description

The SVGShapeData class defines a single shape stored in an SVG file.

Note:
The shape is stored as a polygon.

Status AggOO::svg::SVGShapeData::Normalize (  ) 

Normalize the shape by scaling the vertices so that the shape radius is 1, and centered at 0,0.

Status AggOO::svg::SVGShapeData::Normalize ( const RectF &  bounds  ) 

Normalize a shape based on a bounding rect.

Parameters:
bounds Bounding rect. The shape will be centered in this rect, and scaled based on the rect's radius.
